name: ᚛ᚄᚓᚐᚄᚐ᚜ (Feasa)
description:
Sometimes a story is just that, a story. But sometimes what seems like a simple fairy tale is a warning for the reader. You've found yourself there now, with the rest of the story scattered to the winds with a witch on your tail. Navigate the forest, eating mushrooms and listening to the song of the pages and items you need to lock the witch back away.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
LMB - Interact
E and Q - Turn pages
